name: happy doomsday (baumhaustuer)
description:
"a truely beautifull and amazing game that should win all categories in the brackeys game jam"  
-New york times

"you always wanted to create chaos death and destruction? well then you might wanna see a doctor cause you have probably mental issues, but you can also live you sick dream in this beautiful game"
- me

You are a simple human being until you suddenly get kidnapped by reading a letter (videogame logic) and now you have to create chaos and suffering in the world. How many of the 150! unique scenarios can you find? (actually its just 140, but 150 sounds way better)

Controls: 

well, there are no controls besides typing why are you even reading this?

When you need help to find words just type "help" and please let me know if you were not able to beat the game if the game is unbeatable i will put a list of example commands in the description

ok here is a list for everyone who cant find a word:

----------------------------------

-bomb 

-dracula

-aliens

-weapons

-explode

-violence

--------------------------------------

writing/art: Jonuko, Baumhaustuer

coding, music, sound design: Baumhaustuer
